technique: Bloom swirl 70g water for 8 seconds, pour (low and fast) 200g by 1:00, finish by 1:20. Do a 2–3 second Rao Spin ASAP.

acidity.notes: Plum or cherry kind of tart. Just a little insipid and sour.

sweetness.notes: Cream, sparkling, but not very sweet.

finish.notes: Finish tastes relatively neutral, but mouth is sucking after sip.

flavor: Lots of storytelling (complexity) in the first sip, but overall sour and watery.
observations: Fast drawdown. Bloom water did not feel like enough.
actionItem: Change grind to 23 but keep same technique.
